ValidationRule.description: It is mandatory when lead source is Loyalty and also when lead source is Referral and Lead sub Source is Existing client reference.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(IF( OR ( (ISPICKVAL( Lead_Source__c, 'Loyalty')), (ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c,'Referral')), (ISPICKVAL(Lead_Sub_Source__c, 'Existing client reference')) ) , ISBLANK( Customer_Reference__c) , false), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_prospect == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
